product_name: Grivel G1+ S.A. Ice Axe with Leash - 74cm
long_description: Gear up for classic glacier climbs around the U.S. and abroad with the Grivel G1+ S.A. ice axe. Hot-forged, chromoly steel head provides durability and strength for solid bite into ice and great chopping power. Ergonomic head fits comfortably in your hand while ascending snowfields and glaciers. Chromoly steel spike plunges easily into hard-packed snow and ice. S.A. (Self Arrest) curvature of the shaft gives you more power when you're trying to arrest a fall and increases spike penetration on ascent and descent. Strong aluminum alloy shaft keeps the weight down to 553g. The Grivel G1+ S.A. ice axe includes a basic leash. 74cm length is well suited for climbers taller than about 6 ft.
short_description: Gear up for classic glacier climbs around the U.S. and abroad with the Grivel G1+ S.A. ice axe.
